<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Marks the alert as viewed/read/unread"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/alerts/{id}/mark"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Marks the alert as viewed/read/unread. (Marking as unviewed is not supported.)

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"success":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
